src_original: caturbhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣak śalyāpahartā rājārhaś ca bhavati rājayogyaś ca rājāṃgatve ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
evam eva caturbhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttaro bhiṣak śalyāpahartety ucyate.
iha bhikṣavas [Tib.174a] tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
yathā tad anyaṃ deśaṃ tyajaty anyaṃ deśaṃ krāmati.
[Tib.242a] evam ayam ānaṃtaryamārgaṃ tyajati vimuktimārgaṃ krāmati saṃmukhībhāvataḥ.
evam ayam ānaṃtaryamārgeṇājitān satkāyadṛṣṭyādīn kleśāṃ jayati tatprāticchedāt.  jitāṃś cādhyāvasati vimuktimārgeṇa.
